title: engengum unnaruL
sahitya:
engengum unnaruL pongi viLaiyADum inbattaik-kaNDEnE init-tunbattai aNDEnE parAshakti


anupallavi

  tanga naghai shei taLir iLam kAlaiyil shAnta mukham kaNDEn oru 
kAntak-kanal uNDEn vEdAntap-poruL viNDEN tAyE


caraNam    uLLum puramum uyirum uDalum ulagamum un mayamE un
uruvamum cinmayamE malai veLLamum vAnum kaDalum shuDaru mun
vEda viLakkam anrO sangIta naTanamanrO nAda jyOti vishvAmbariyE
